hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/sh curl -O http://localhost:8081/artifactory/simple/libs-release-local/com/huettermann/all/$version/all-$version.war
cp all-$version.war all-$version-GA.war
curl -u michaelhuettermann:${bintray_key} -X DELETE https://api.bintray.com/packages/michaelhuettermann/meow/cat/versions/$version-GA
curl -u michaelhuettermann:${bintray_key} -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST https://api.bintray.com/packages/michaelhuettermann/meow/cat/versions --data "{ \"name\": \"$version-GA\", \"desc\": \"desc\" }"
curl -T "$WORKSPACE/all-$version-GA.war" -u michaelhuettermann:${bintray_key} -H "X-Bintray-Package:cat" -H "X-Bintray-Version:$version-GA" https://api.bintray.com/content/michaelhuettermann/meow/
curl -u michaelhuettermann:${bintray_key} -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST https://api.bintray.com/content/michaelhuettermann/meow/cat/$version-GA/publish --data "{ \"discard\": \"false\" }"
